description: Non material amendment to planning permission ref 33239/APP/2024/437 dated 19-12-2024 (Conversion of integral garage to habitable accommodation, erection of double storey extension to the rear, erection of front porch, installation of front dormer and installation of 7 side roof lights) to change the front dormer window fenestrations and amend the rear elevation roof to be consistent with approved side elevations.
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on Drawing Refs:
Stanley/01 Existing Ground & First Floor Plans and Roof Plan
Stanley/04 revision C Existing and Proposed Site Block Plan
Stanley/05 revision D Proposed Ground and First Floor Plans

To ensure the development complies with the provisions of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part One - Strategic Policies (November 2012) and the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part Two - Development Management Policies (January 2020), and the London Plan (March 2021).

Notwithstanding the non-material amendments hereby approved, other than Condition 2, which is superseded by the above condition, all other conditions relating to Planning Permission Ref: 33239/APP/2024/437 must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.
The following plan has been SUPERSEDED:
The following plan has been APPROVED:
